charges.charge_description: On or about July 10, 2017, in the Western District of Missouri and elsewhere, EDWARD MERRITT, the defendant, having been convicted of a crime punishable by imprisonment for a term exceeding one year, did knowingly possess, in and affecting commerce, a firearm, to wit, a Taurus 740, .40 caliber pistol, bearing serial number SIX10914, in violation of Title 18, United States Code, Sections 922(g)(1) and 924(a)(2).

charges.charge_offence_description: On or about July 10, 2017, in the Western District

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant pleaded guilty to count 1 on February 27, 2018. IMPRISONMENT: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 46 months as to count 1. The court makes the following recommendations to the Bureau of Prisons: That defendant be allowed to participate in RDAP. The defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal. SUPERVISED RELEASE: Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of three (3) years on Count 1. Mandatory, standard and special conditions of supervision imposed. CRIMINAL MONETARY PENALTIES: MSA: $100.00. No fine or restitution.
